title: Toddlers Care
meta_content: Faith Alive Fellowship provides toddlers care during normal services for up to 4 years of age.
content:
During Sunday morning worship and Thursday night prayer toddlers care is provided for up to 4 years of age. 
	We have a dedicated room for the kiddos complimented with a closet full of toys, snacks (if permitted) and
	a selection of veggie tales and other bible based cartoons when neccessary.
